definition: Kangxi radical 61 (心) as a vertical side element
to imitate to perfection/to be remarkably true to life
to imitate to perfection/to be remarkably true to life
for fear that/lest/also written 唯恐
variant of 唯利是圖|唯利是图[wei2 li4 shi4 tu2]
see 唯命是從|唯命是从[wei2 ming4 shi4 cong2]
to lie prostrate/to prostrate oneself (in veneration)
variant of 思維|思维[si1 wei2]
variant of 恭維|恭维[gong1 wei5]

sentences.english: Hu Shi's value system of scientific education was characterized by pure science.
sentences.chinese: 胡适的科学教育价值观是以惟科学主义为特征的。

sentences.english: Preoperative and intraoperative evaluation of condition of vessels play an important role in selecting proper cases for such flap reconstruction.
sentences.chinese: 惟术前及术中须仔细评估血管状况，慎选合适之病例。

sentences.english: In his heart a man plans his course, but the Lord determines his steps.
sentences.chinese: 人心筹算自己的道路，惟耶和华指引他的脚步。

sentences.english: The purposes of a man's heart are deep waters, but a man of understanding draws them out.
sentences.chinese: 人心怀藏谋略，好像水深，惟明哲人才能汲引出来。

sentences.english: But that Thy blood was shed for me.
But you, O Lord , are exalted forever.
sentences.chinese: 惟你耶和华是至高，直到永远。

sentences.english: He works hard, but he doesn't care for his health.
sentences.chinese: 他工作努力，惟注意身体不够。

sentences.english: This history, but the performance failed to do.
sentences.chinese: “这种历史，惟在三湘表现尽致”。

sentences.english: But the lights of Amitabha Buddha pervasively illuminate uncountable, immeasurable, innumerable Buddhalands.
sentences.chinese: 惟阿弥陀佛，光明普照无量无边无数佛刹。

sentences.english: Department of millet food type, viscosity, and Longdong Lingtai but rich.
sentences.chinese: 系黍类食粮，黏性大，陇东惟灵台盛产。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, you are not the one to build the temple, but your son, who is your own flesh and blood-he is the one who will build the temple for my Name.
sentences.chinese: 只是你不可建殿，惟你所生的儿子必为我名建殿。

sentences.english: But the fields and villages around the city they had given to Caleb son of Jephunneh as his possession.
sentences.chinese: 惟将属城的田地和村庄给了耶孚尼的儿子迦勒为业。

sentences.english: Then you will be able to discern the will of God, and to know what is good, acceptable, and perfect.
sentences.chinese: 盖惟如此，方能体验天主尽善尽美之圣意耳。

sentences.english: You can make progress only if you are modest.
However, the University campus will continue to be under the management and control of the University Council.
sentences.chinese: 惟一切有关校园之管理措施仍由大学校董会负责。

sentences.english: You will only observe with your eyes and see the punishment of the wicked.
sentences.chinese: 你惟亲眼观看，见恶人遭报。

definition: classical final particle, similar to modern 了[le5]
